Uses of Interface
org.jasig.cas.services.AttributeReleasePolicy

  • Packages that use AttributeReleasePolicy 
    Package Description
    org.jasig.cas.services
    This package is contains classes related to the restriction of CAS usage to a particular set of services.

    • Uses of AttributeReleasePolicy in org.jasig.cas.services

      Classes in org.jasig.cas.services that implement AttributeReleasePolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAttributeReleasePolicy
      Abstract release policy for attributes, provides common shared settings such as loggers and attribute filter config.
      class  ReturnAllAttributeReleasePolicy
      Return all attributes for the service, regardless of service settings.
      class  ReturnAllowedAttributeReleasePolicy
      Return only the collection of allowed attributes out of what's resolved for the principal.
      class  ReturnMappedAttributeReleasePolicy
      Return a collection of allowed attributes for the principal, but additionally, offers the ability to rename attributes on a per-service level.
      Methods in org.jasig.cas.services that return AttributeReleasePolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttributeReleasePolicy AbstractRegisteredService.getAttributeReleasePolicy() 
      AttributeReleasePolicy RegisteredService.getAttributeReleasePolicy()
      Gets the attribute filtering policy to determine how attributes are to be filtered and released for this service.
      Methods in org.jasig.cas.services with parameters of type AttributeReleasePolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractRegisteredService.setAttributeReleasePolicy(AttributeReleasePolicy policy)
      Sets the attribute filtering policy.
